Song.title: Tis So Sweet to Trust in Jesus
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Louisa Stead and William Kirkpatrick Public domain

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [G | C | G | C]
VERSE 1: [G]‘Tis so [G/B]sweet to [C]trust in [G]Jesus [G]And to [Em]take Him [C]at His [D]word [G]Just to [G/B]rest up[C]on His [G]promise [C]And to [Am7]know, “Thus [D]saith the [G]Lord”
CHORUS: [G]Jesus, [G/B]Jesus, [C]how I [D]trust Him [Em]How I’ve [C]proved Him [Am7]o’er and [D]o’er [G]Jesus, [G/B]Jesus, [C]precious [G]Jesus [C]O for [Am7]grace to [D]trust Him [G | C | G | C]more
[(Chorus after V3 G | C | G | Bsus B )]
VERSE 2: [G]O how [G/B]sweet to [C]trust in [G]Jesus, [G]Just to [Em]trust His [C]cleansing [D]blood [G]And in [G/B]simple [C]faith to [G]plunge me [C]‘Neath the [Am7]healing [D]cleansing [G]flood
VERSE 3: [G]Yes, ‘tis [G/B]sweet to [C]trust in [G]Jesus [G]Just from [Em]sin and [C]self to [D]cease [G]Just from [G/B]Jesus [C]simply [G]taking [C]Life and [Am7]rest and [D]joy and [G]peace
{new_page} {key:E} VERSE 4: [E]I’m so [E/G#]glad I [A]learned to [E]trust Thee [E]Precious [C#m]Jesus, [A]Savior, [B]friend [E]And I [E/G#]know that [A]Thou art [E]with me [A]Wilt be [F#m7]with me [B]to the [E]end
CHORUS: [E]Jesus, [E/G#]Jesus, [A]how I [B]trust Him [C#m]How I’ve [A]proved Him [F#m7]o’er and [B]o’er [E]Jesus, [E/G#]Jesus, [A]precious [E]Jesus [A]O for [F#m7]grace to [B]trust Him [E | A | E | A]more
